attributes.action: Offer all Residents of Hong Kong British citizenship.
attributes.additional_details:
The agreement between the Chinese government and U.K. government of 2 systems one country is no longer being honoured by the Chinese. Therefore the freedoms of the Hong Kong citizens are being curbed. The U.K. government has a duty to protect the freedoms and liberty of all Hong Kong citizens.

Furthermore, the citizens of Hong Kong are highly educated and will thus help restart the British economy after the COVID-19 pandemic.
attributes.background:
To make a fast pass for Hong Kong citizens to gain British citizenship and gain U.K. residency. 

Due to the infringement by Mainland China of the freedoms of Hong Kong citizens the U.K. government should invite all Hong Kong citizens the ability to live, work and stay in the U.K.
